body: The expected filesystem is a filesystem like hdfs, s3fs, azure/abfs. I've not come across a case where LocalFileSystem is being used except tests.
+1. Please file and link the HADOOP jira so it can be tracked. I can can check this in today.
Thanks @jteagles, I've created and linked the hadoop issue.
